children.name:
AssertionError: Expected status code 204, but got 502. Response: {'fault': {'faultstring': 'Unexpected EOF at target', 'detail': {'errorcode': 'messaging.adaptors.http.flow.UnexpectedEOFAtTarget'}}}
assert 502 == 204
 +  where 502 = <Response [502]>.status_code
 +    where <Response [502]> = <utilities.context.ScenarioContext object at 0x7f6cae973990>.response
Verify that the POST Create API for different vaccine types
Verify that VACCINATION PROCEDURE TERM, VACCINE PRODUCT TERM, SITE OF VACCINATION TERM, ROUTE OF VACCINATION TERM fields are mapped to correct instance of coding.display fields in imms delta table

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 201, but got: 502. Response: {'fault': {'faultstring': 'Unexpected EOF at target', 'detail': {'errorcode': 'messaging.adaptors.http.flow.UnexpectedEOFAtTarget'}}}

Verify that VACCINATION PROCEDURE TERM, VACCINE PRODUCT TERM, SITE OF VACCINATION TERM, ROUTE OF VACCINATION TERM fields are blank in imms delta table if no text or value string or display field is present
Verify that the GET method of Search API will be successful with all the valid parameters

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 201, but got: 403. Response: {'resourceType': 'OperationOutcome', 'id': 'aa49459d-67c8-4627-ab4d-60b275673fd5', 'meta': {'profile': ['https://simplifier.net/guide/UKCoreDevelopment2/ProfileUKCore-OperationOutcome']}, 'issue': [{'severity': 'error', 'code': 'forbidden', 'details': {'coding': [{'system': 'https://fhir.nhs.uk/Codesystem/http-error-codes', 'code': 'FORBIDDEN'}]}, 'diagnostics': 'Unauthorized request for vaccine type'}]}
Verify that the Read method of API will be successful and fetch valid imms event detail

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 200, but got: 400. Response: {'resourceType': 'OperationOutcome', 'id': '3194f0c1-32b2-48c2-94a6-368f696fc87f', 'meta': {'profile': ['https://simplifier.net/guide/UKCoreDevelopment2/ProfileUKCore-OperationOutcome']}, 'issue': [{'severity': 'error', 'code': 'invalid', 'details': {'coding': [{'system': 'https://fhir.nhs.uk/Codesystem/http-error-codes', 'code': 'INVALID'}]}, 'diagnostics': '-immunization.target must be one or more of the following: ROTAVIRUS, RSV, SHINGLES, 6IN1, MMR, FLU, 3IN1, PERTUSSIS, MENB, HIB, MMRV, BCG, MENACWY, 4IN1, COVID, PNEUMOCOCCAL, HPV, HEPB'}]}
Verify that the POST method of Search API will be successful with all the valid parameters

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 200, but got: 400. Response: {'resourceType': 'OperationOutcome', 'id': '41c9a3a2-1f4e-4593-a9c6-214bcc6577b3', 'meta': {'profile': ['https://simplifier.net/guide/UKCoreDevelopment2/ProfileUKCore-OperationOutcome']}, 'issue': [{'severity': 'error', 'code': 'invalid', 'details': {'coding': [{'system': 'https://fhir.nhs.uk/Codesystem/http-error-codes', 'code': 'INVALID'}]}, 'diagnostics': '-immunization.target must be one or more of the following: ROTAVIRUS, RSV, SHINGLES, 6IN1, MMR, FLU, 3IN1, PERTUSSIS, MENB, HIB, MMRV, BCG, MENACWY, 4IN1, COVID, PNEUMOCOCCAL, HPV, HEPB'}]}
Verify that the POST method of Search API will be successful with all the valid parameters

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 400, but got: 502. Response: {'fault': {'faultstring': 'Unexpected EOF at target', 'detail': {'errorcode': 'messaging.adaptors.http.flow.UnexpectedEOFAtTarget'}}}
Verify that Search API will throw error if Disease Type is invalid
Verify that Search API will throw error if date to is invalid
